properties.areaDesc: Lake Huron from Harbor Beach to Port Sanilac 5NM Off Shore to US/Canadian border; Lake Huron from Port Austin to Harbor Beach 5NM Off Shore to the US/Canadian border; Lake Huron from Port Sanilac to Port Huron 5NM Off Shore to US/Canadian border; Lake Huron from Sturgeon Point to Alabaster MI 5NM off shore to US/Canadian border
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 4 at 9:46PM EST until January 6 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 24 knots from the west with
gusts up to 35 knots. The largest significant waves will be 6
feet with a potential maximum wave height of 8 feet.

* WHERE...Lake Huron from Port Austin to Harbor Beach beyond 5NM
Off Shore, Lake Huron from Port Sanilac to Port Huron beyond
5NM Off Shore, Lake Huron from Harbor Beach to Port Sanilac
beyond 5NM Off Shore and Lake Huron from Sturgeon Point to
Alabaster MI beyond 5NM off shore.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 2 AM EST Monday
with the largest waves expected around 6 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: GALE WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING
